pluggable.name: 123LinkIt
pluggable.author: Owen Winkler
pluggable.description: Generate money easily from your blog by transforming brand names and product keywords into affiliate links.

help.value: Generate money easily from your blog by transforming brand names and product keywords into affiliate links. There's no need to apply to affiliate networks or programs - we do it all for you. Just install the plugin, sync your posts and we'll automatically add relevant, money-making affiliate links to your blog.
